Package com.capgemini.cobigen.impl.aop

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractInterceptor
    The AbstractInterceptor provides the ability of holding the target object for any InvocationHandler implementation implementing the AbstractInterceptor.
    BeanFactory
    AOP factory with a specific simple scope to not introduce any heavy weight frameworks and make separation of concerns a little bit easier.
    CachedInterceptor
    The CachedInterceptor enables caching of several requests on the same method.
    ExceptionFacadeInterceptor
    This is the interceptor processing ExceptionFacade annotations.
    ProxyFactory
    A factory for creating Proxy objects.
